# Wrap action test cases
# Format: input<TAB>token_idx<TAB>wrapper_type<TAB>expected_buffer
# TAB-separated to allow special characters

# Double quotes
echo foo bar	2	"..."	echo "foo" bar
hello world	1	"..."	"hello" world
abc	1	"..."	"abc"

# Single quotes
echo foo bar	2	'...'	echo 'foo' bar
hello world	1	'...'	'hello' world

# Quoted variable "$..."
myvar	1	"$..."	"$myvar"
echo foo	2	"$..."	echo "$foo"

# Variable expansion ${...}
myvar	1	${...}	${myvar}
echo foo	2	${...}	echo ${foo}

# Command substitution $(...)
date	1	$(...)	$(date)
echo cmd	2	$(...)	echo $(cmd)

# Backtick legacy
date	1	`...`	`date`

# Square brackets
test	1	[...]	[test]

# Curly braces
a,b,c	1	{...}	{a,b,c}

# Parentheses
subshell	1	(...)	(subshell)

# Angle brackets
file	1	<...>	<file>

# Edge cases - special characters in tokens
--flag=value	1	"..."	"--flag=value"
"quoted"	1	'...'	'"quoted"'
$var	1	"..."	"$var"
ðŸš€rocket	1	"..."	"ðŸš€rocket"
path/to/file	1	"..."	"path/to/file"
